org.gbif.common.search.model

Annotation Type FullTextSearchField


  • @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface FullTextSearchField
    Annotates setter methods of fields that can be used as part of the full text search. This annotation should be consumed by SearchService implementations.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String field
      Default field name for full text search potentially doing a wildcard partial match.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String exactMatchField
      Name of the field used for exact matching of tokens, the absence of this field implies that the default field is used.
      double exactMatchScore
      Value used for scoring exact matching.
      String highlightField
      Name of the highlighted field, is specified this field is used instead of the field attribute.
      WildcardPadding partialMatching
      WildcardPadding pattern for the full text field.
      double partialMatchScore
      Value for scoring partial matching.

    • Element Detail

      • field

        public abstract String field
        Default field name for full text search potentially doing a wildcard partial match.

      • exactMatchField

        public abstract String exactMatchField
        Name of the field used for exact matching of tokens, the absence of this field implies that the default field is used.
        Default:
        ""

      • exactMatchScore

        public abstract double exactMatchScore
        Value used for scoring exact matching.
        Default:
        1.0

      • highlightField

        public abstract String highlightField
        Name of the highlighted field, is specified this field is used instead of the field attribute.
        Default:
        ""

      • partialMatching

        public abstract WildcardPadding partialMatching
        WildcardPadding pattern for the full text field.
        Default:
        org.gbif.common.search.model.WildcardPadding.NONE

      • partialMatchScore

        public abstract double partialMatchScore
        Value for scoring partial matching. This field is set regardless of the "partialMatching" values: BOTH, LEFT and RIGHT.
        Default:
        0.5
